Reviews.Title: not as i had fully hoped
Reviews.Author: Xtian
Reviews.Content: i suppose it's good enough for the price, it can't use mobile data while being on the phone and it does not use 4g on t-mobile only 2g

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: this is a good phone the only problem I had with it is that there is either a short in the power/lock button or a problem in the software.  so basically when I press the lock button the thing powers off and I have to turn it back on when I want to use it, other than this one crappy problem that I think is annoying this phone is awesome, and what really sucks though is that i only had it for a day and I'm sending it back. But then again I could have been having some bad luck and got a defective one.SO I tried this phone for a second time and I was given almost the wrong model, the second one was the LG-E730f not the E730. and this time the phone would not read any sim card I put in it. Other than that the phone worked just fine.

ProductInfo.Features:
Android; 3.8 Ultra AMOLED capacitive touchscreen; Corning Gorilla Glass
5MP camera; autofocus; geo-tagging; face detection; video recording 720p@30fps.
A-GPS support, Wi-Fi, MP4/MP3, FM Radio
Document viewer: Organizer: Voice memo/dial/commands
1GB internal storage; microSD up to 32GB
ProductInfo.Name: LG LG-E730 Optimus Sol Unlocked Cellphone - No Warranty - Black
